name: Miro (Duckonaut, squp)
description:
Infect the world around you, breaking it down into its simplest components. Abstraction is a valuable tool, wield it wisely.


Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows - Movement
  • Left click - shoot projectile
  • R - Restart level

Code: Duckonaut
Art & Sound: squp
Level design by squp and Duckonaut

Made in roughly 8 hours for a private game jam with friends.
